Posts.Content: I have just investigated and talked to health care providers. Internet studies. Nothing farfetched like "Tree Root". But natural foods like fruit, organic food, lay off the processed sugar if possible. Natural Sweetners are good like Honey. I stress Vitamin D-3. Google it and read about it.
Posts.Title: Stage 3b now, fear of future metastasis

Posts.Content: There are things you can do to help prevent the spread. You need to change your diet and stay away from processed food. Go organic if possible i.e. fruit and veggies. Take vitamin D-3 which helps boost your immune system and can help fight off cancer. Stay away from garbage food. Try to exercise to keep your weight down. Be you own advocate.
